DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety effectiveness TurboHawk treatment peripheral arterial disease ( PAD ) superficial femoral and/or popliteal arteries Japanese population .
DOC.brief_title: TurboHawk™ Japan Trial Patients With PAD
DOC.criteria: Provides write informed consent Willing comply followup evaluation specify time Has Rutherford Clinical Category Score 24 Disease locate within femoropopliteal artery Has evidence ≥ 50 % stenosis occlusion superficial femoral and/or popliteal , confirm angiography Each discrete target lesion 's length ≥4cm ≤ 15 cm Reference vessel diameter ≥ 3.5 mm ≤ 7.0 mm Previously implant stent ( ) stent graft ( ) target leg Life expectancy le 12 month Has plan surgical endovascular intervention target vessel 30 day index procedure Has instent restenosis target lesion Has aneurysmal target vessel Has perforation , dissection injury access target vessel require additional stenting surgical intervention prior enrollment
